subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Football
College Athletics
Child Abuse and Neglect
Sex Crimes
Football (College)
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Amid a sexual abuse scandal, Joe Paterno, the football coach, was fired and Graham B. Spanier, the university president, was removed Wednesday night.
snippet: Amid a sexual abuse scandal, Joe Paterno, the football coach, was fired and Graham B. Spanier, the university president, was removed Wednesday night.
